release.notes: 1.20_1.0.42 D1 Fixed Wolves, Cows, Pigs, Chickens broken by spigot and paper. added player.json to entity for player head chance.

developer.notes: D1 Added new config option to disable dlc nag for OPs. also reduced chance of being nagged. D2 Fixed viewheads command, fixed exception with zombie_villager.
